Issue.creator: ozheregelya
Issue.summary: Blocking Issue: Large pool stopped working during load test
Issue.description: transactions successfully written. 4. Run python3 Perf_Add_nyms.py -s 5 -n 100 => transactions successfully written. 5. Run python3 Perf_Add_nyms.py -s 5 -n 10000 Actual Results: Pool stopped working after writing of ~300 transactions. Count of domain transactions: 291 on 1-7 nodes, 310 on 8 node, and 311 on remaining nodes. Expected Results: Pool should work. >
